message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a good deal for both of us.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,000. Can we agree on that price?
